chunks.chunk_content:
IITJ_WLAN configuration steps for Linux  User  
Connect with SSID : IITJ_WLAN  from available Wi -Fi connection on your  machine .

Enter your  internet access  username and password  and click on okay to access internet 
services .
Select Net work under Wi -Fi connection  and select IITJ_WLAN to connect.
On authentication pop up kindly select following settings .

SSID: IITJ_WLAN   
Security : WPA2/WPA3 Enterprise / 802.1x EAP  
Authentication : Protected EAP  (PEAP ) 
Anonymous identity : leave it blank  
CA Certificate:  select  No CA certificate is required  
PEAP version:  Automatic  
Inner authentication: MSCHAPV2  
User name : (Internet access ID)  
Password:  (Internet access password)  
 
 

 
At last click on Apply and access the inte rnet services.
